flawed_nl_solution:
One student got 37 questions right because 40 - 3 = <<40-3=37>>37
This student's proportion right is 0.93 because 37 / 40 = <<37/40=0.93>>0.93
This student got a 92.5% because 0.93 x 100 = <<0.93*100=92.5>>92.5
The student got got a 95% got 83 right because 40 x 0.95 = <<40*0.95=83>>83
Hannah needs to get 84 questions right because 83 + 1 = <<83+1=84>>84

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 38, not 83. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
